sentences.en: He allowed his works to express an introspective consciousness of individual isolation.
sentences.cn: 他使自己的作品表现了孤独的个人内省的意识.

sentences.en: His mood changed too. He became increasingly introspective and the dry humour became and less visible.
sentences.cn: 他的心情也改变了. 他变得越来越内向了,连那一板正经的笑话也越来越少见了.

sentences.en: Identical experience and introspective experience further deepen direct experience.
sentences.cn: 认同体验和反思体验是对直接体验的进一步深化和提升.

sentences.en: In this introspective journey, boundaries between dream and reality, memory and truth are diffuse.
sentences.cn: 这一段内省之旅, 穿梭于梦境与现实, 回忆与真理的模糊的边缘.

sentences.en: One - sided and introspective mathematical speculation leads into sterile fields.
sentences.cn: 片面 的、内省的数学思索把人们引向不毛之地.

sentences.en: Perhaps film suits him better than fine arts, which are more introspective and self - absorbed.
sentences.cn: 或许,对于 孤芳自赏 的美术来说, 电影更适合他.

sentences.en: Satire is a lonely and introspective occupation.
sentences.cn: 讽刺是一项孤独而又内省的工作。

sentences.en: So my blog an introspective diary of my feelings, opinions, emotions and epiphanies.
sentences.cn: 所以我的部落格,记载的是我内心的感觉, 看法,感触, 领悟.

sentences.en: The feminism literature is in the multiple frame currently at deep introspective stage.
sentences.cn: 今天,女性主义文学出现了多元并存格局,并进入了深刻内省阶段.

sentences.en: The philosophical thinking pattern possesses metaphysical, limitless, introspective, abstract and contradictory features.
sentences.cn: 作为哲学的思维方式,具有超验性 、 无限性 、 反思性 、 抽象性和矛盾性.

sentences.en: Their introspective ways were not free of drawbacks, however.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说,他们内省的理念不为有缺陷的人服务.

sentences.en: This matter forces me to become introspective.
sentences.cn: 这件事迫使我变得自省。

trans.tran_en: tending to think deeply about your own thoughts, feelings, or behaviour
